definition: to sit astride/to ride (a horse, bike etc)/classifier for saddle horses
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
if you ride a tiger, it's hard to get off (idiom); fig. impossible to stop halfway
to sit on the fence/to take both sides in a dispute

sentences.english: Over the mountains, and under the sky-riding dirty grey horses, go you and I.
sentences.chinese: 在山區，天空下騎骯髒的灰色馬，去你和我。

sentences.english: Rhett bought his daughter a pony to ride on.
sentences.chinese: 瑞德給他的女兒買了一匹小馬來騎。

sentences.english: We ride to school on a bicycle and playing cricket isno problem, " Shivanath said, according to the Daily Mail."
sentences.chinese: 我們可以騎自行車去學校，打板球也不成問題”。

sentences.english: Riding on merry-go-round makes me feel dizzy.
They rode over to see us last week.
sentences.chinese: 上星期他們騎馬來探望我們。

sentences.english: Would you like to go cycling with me on the Road Around The Island on Saturday?
sentences.chinese: 星期六你願意和我一起去環島路騎自行車嗎？

sentences.english: You messed up your hair riding so hard.
sentences.chinese: 你騎得那麼賣勁，把頭髮都弄亂了。

sentences.english: His mother rode him on her back.
sentences.chinese: 他的母親讓他騎在她的背上。

sentences.english: The camels in desert countries are for riding and for carrying goods.
sentences.chinese: 沙漠地區的駱駝供騎人和運貨之用。

sentences.english: Little Boys and Girls, Will You Come and Ride with Me on My Broomstick?
sentences.chinese: 小男孩和女孩，你們能一起來騎在掃把上飛嘛？

sentences.english: I hope you ride my bike without a helmet and get hit by a monster truck.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你騎我的自行車時沒戴頭盔被一輛泥頭車撞死。

sentences.english: Jiamusi cavalry battalion bike riding club opening ceremony in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 佳木斯騎兵營自行車俱樂部09年開騎儀式。

sentences.english: We rode on a huge horse. Grumdalclitch carried me in my box.
sentences.chinese: 我們騎在大馬上，葛蘭朵克麗琪則抱着裝我的箱子。

sentences.english: A horse without a rider ran past.
sentences.chinese: 一匹沒有人騎的馬跑過去了。

sentences.english: Sometimes I go to educate by bike and at whiles on foot.
sentences.chinese: 我有時騎自行車上學，有時步行去。

sentences.english: Remember that trip to the Ming Tombs on our bicycles?
sentences.chinese: 記得我們騎自行車去明十三陵的那次旅行嗎？

definition: to ride (a bicycle, horse, motorbike etc)/cycling/horseback riding/motorbike riding/a ride/CL:次[ci4]
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
to wind/to coil (thread)/to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour/to confuse/to perplex
locomotive/train engine car/scooter (Tw)/(slang) (Tw) hard to get along with/a pain in the ass/damn!/crap!
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to go to school/to attend school
to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)
